attributes.action: Make hitting or killing cats a criminal offence, like it is a dog!
attributes.additional_details:
Happened in Newton Aycliffe 30th July 2015 7:25pm (there about) Red Peugeot 2008 (4x4) 
Happened near garage near cobblers hall
attributes.background: Someone in Newton Aycliffe purposely swerved to hit a cat he had a bad head trauma and he had a fit I went to try to save him but was to late all the time my 3 year old saw the whole thing asking question after question I don't think any 3 year old should have to see any thing like this!
